alert.note: Alert for Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:01PM EDT until July 07 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Vernon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainer Spring, Nixon, Betts, Bennett, Youngstown, Fountain, Porter Lake, Singer Road, Saunders, Greenhead and Riverside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
